body:
recently there has been a wave if very bad hacker at avicus some fly other kill aura and some anti kb
so i have taken in to consideration of leaving avicus and going to overcast network. i will think about this but if more hackers come in i will be leaving. i might be coming back for tournaments and clan scrims.

title: might be leaving

replies.body: Bro, hackers are not going to stop coming. Just use /report and stay away from them. Plus, "might leave" posts are very unnecessary. If you leave just make a post about that. It is unnecessary to make these posts.
replies.body_tagged: Bro, hackers are not going to stop coming. Just use /report and stay away from them. Plus, "might leave" posts are very unnecessary. If you leave just make a post about that. It is unnecessary to make these posts.
